Translations.Text: This is the Book of Allah: there is no doubt about it. It is guidance to Godfearing people
who believe in the unseen, establish the Salats and expend (in Our way) out of what We have bestowed on them
who believe in the Book We have sent down to you (i.e. the QurÂ´an) and in the Books sent down before you, and firmly believe in the Hereafter
Such people are on the right way from their Lord and such are truly successful
